title: Easy spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: ['450g lean minced beef', '340g spaghetti', '1 teaspoon salt', '3/4 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/8 teaspoon garlic granules', '2 tablespoons dried minced onion', '600g chopped tomatoes', '200g tomato puree', '1/2 (220g) tin mushrooms, drained and sliced']
